description: This file defines a thread-safe singleton C++ class OttPermissionCache managing an in-memory cache of permissions keyed by application IDs for OTT services. It provides methods to get, update, invalidate, clear, and query permissions, with external file operations for persistence.

classes.name: OttPermissionCache
classes.description: A thread-safe singleton class that maintains an in-memory cache of permissions keyed by application ID for OTT services, with methods to get, update, invalidate, clear, and check cache entries.

methods.name: Instance
methods.description: Provides access to the singleton instance of OttPermissionCache.

methods.name: GetPermissions
methods.description: Retrieves a copy of the permissions vector associated with the specified application ID.

methods.name: UpdateCache
methods.description: Updates or inserts the permissions list for a given application ID, with atomic disk persistence.

methods.name: Invalidate
methods.description: Removes the cached permissions for a specified application ID.

methods.name: Clear
methods.description: Clears all entries from the cache.

methods.name: Has
methods.description: Checks if a specific application ID exists in the cache.

methods.name: Size
methods.description: Returns the number of application ID entries currently in the cache.
